content: {"locationId": "5866", "organizationId": "4989", "name": "Salvation Song Ministries", "address1": "34835 N 7th St", "address2": "", "city": "Phoenix", "state": "AZ", "zipCode": "85086", "country": null, "phone": "623-581-0627", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "33.8025185", "longitude": "-112.0647301", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "We are the extension of Christ ministry here on earth sharing His love and compassion while providing food and hygiene to those who are less equipped or resourced in such a season as this (Mathew 25:35-40 NKJV).", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "623-581-0627", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Indoor Service", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Pet Food / Supplies, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 44, "regionName": "St. Mary's Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "71a2fe75-eba6-4f29-916b-d3614dd69e78.png", "website": "https://www.firstfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "US Mountain Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "MST", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Monday 3:00 PM-6:00 PM", "Wednesday 3:00 PM-6:00 PM", "Friday 3:00 PM-6:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
